character... so Aubrey\'s only purpose is to be a wife and
live in your house...

descriptionHtml:
I created this simple mod to have a pretty wife for my
character... so Aubrey\'s only purpose is to be a wife and
live in your house...

I COULD MAKE MORE VERSIONS OF HER, LIKE BLONDE OR WITH DIFFERENT EYES OR LIPS IF I WILL RECEIVE A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF REQUESTS WITH YOUR COMMENTS...

INSTALLATION:

Copy the files to the Skyrim \"Data\" directory as you do with
any other mod.

Once in-game use the console to place Aubrey at your position

Just watch the \"monkey proof screenshots\" (included within the download) to learn how to do it!

Remember to wear an Amulet of Mara before talking to her,
otherwise Marriage Proposal Dialogue won\\\'t appear...


riccaborto
author: riccaborto
